name: The Dragon Scroll (DEMO)
description:
The Dragon Scroll is a medieval combat side scroller game where you must travel through different places to find an ancient relic known as The dragon scroll. In this demo you are able to experience the first 3 levels, including the first boss fight. Please note that some things are still placeholder and will be replaced later. We are also continuing to work on new levels and features and plan to release the final game later this year, or early next year. Any feedback is appreciated. Also, considering following us on Twitter for updates:

Twitter.com/Dragonscrollgam
